name: Copyright and Communication Consulting Agency/ Latvian Authors Association
goal:
AKKA/LAA is a Latvian multi-repertory copyrights management organization representing musical, literary, dramatic, visual and audiovisual repertoires.
The society is a nongovernmental organization.
AKKA/LAA licenses copyright, collect and distributes royalties to rights owners and protects their copyright in Latvia.
AKKA/LAA is a member of the International Confederation of Societies of Authors and Composers (CISAC) and the European Grouping of Societies of Authors and Composers (GESAC).
interests: Competition, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, International co-operation and development, Single market
euInitiatives: Copyright, collective management of copyright, Intellectual property, media, competition, single digital market.
